question: You borrowed some books from your school or college library. Unfortunately you have to go away to visit a sick relative and cannot return the books in time. Write a letter to the library. Explain what has happened and tell them what you want to do about it.
text: I am writing this letter to request a return date extension for the books I borrowed from the college library last week. My ID card no is 234589. I will explain the whole situation that happened last night and I hope you will understand.

Yesterday, my uncle went to work. After a couple of hours suddenly, we got  a call from his office that he got a heart attack. Afterwards, they took my uncle directly to the hospital. The time when we reached the hospital my uncle was in the emergency ward where he had major heart surgery. Due to his operation, I have to stay with him because my parents are too old to take care of someone.

As a result, I can not able to come back home on time and I am unable to return the books on the due timeline.I really apologize for this and definitely, I want to fix my fault by doing  volunteer work in the library.
I hope that you can understand my situation and accept my apology. I would like to hear back from you as soon as possible.
